title: The Writer's Almanac - Thursday, May 21, 2020
description: On this day in 1881, Clara Barton founded the American Red Cross. After her experiences in the Civil War, she saw a need for a neutral organization to help soldiers.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: On this day in 1881, Clara Barton founded the American Red Cross. After her experiences in the Civil War, she saw a need for a neutral organization to help soldiers.
